A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was not a good movie.

1) Entire plotlines went nowhere.
2) Many logical problems that should have been thought through. Viewer is constantly asking why didn't they do this or why did they do that? How did they know ...? 
3) Characters act out of character. While some may enjoy the deconstruction\, it was handled very poorly and in an unsatisfying way.
4) Makes all the weird\, mysterious stuff from The Force Awakens pointless. In this sense\, not only is it a bad sequel\, it makes the previous movie worse.

I have no desire to watch it again.
